mapper.select: select userid, username from register where userid=#{param1} and userpwd=#{param2}
select count(userid) cnt from register where userid=#{param1}
select zipcode, sido, doroname, build_num1, build_num2, buildname, dong, bungi1, bungi2 from zipcode where doroname like '%${param1}%' order by doroname asc
